Class CommentsObjectGraphVisitor

Object graph visitor that handles comments associated with objects during YAML serialization.

Methods

| Edit this page View Source

EnterMapping(IPropertyDescriptor, IObjectDescriptor, IEmitter)

Indicates whether the specified mapping should be entered. This allows the visitor to override the handling of a particular pair. This overload should be invoked when the mapping is produced by an object's property.

Declaration
public override bool EnterMapping(IPropertyDescriptor key, IObjectDescriptor value, IEmitter context)
Parameters
Type Name Description
IPropertyDescriptor key

The YamlDotNet.Serialization.IPropertyDescriptor that provided access to value.
IObjectDescriptor value

The value of the mapping that is about to be entered.
IEmitter context

The context that this implementation depend on.
Returns
Type Description
bool

If the mapping is to be entered, returns true; otherwise returns false;
Overrides
YamlDotNet.Serialization.ObjectGraphVisitors.ChainedObjectGraphVisitor.EnterMapping(YamlDotNet.Serialization.IPropertyDescriptor, YamlDotNet.Serialization.IObjectDescriptor, YamlDotNet.Core.IEmitter)
